lead_paragraph: Unlike pools that award the same number of points no matter what teams you pick, bonus-point pools are eminently beatable because most people don’t know how to play them correctly.
snippet: Unlike pools that award the same number of points no matter what teams you pick, bonus-point pools are eminently beatable because most people don’t know how to play them correctly.
